ECC PRIVKEY IN

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x580
Size:
0x4
Array Dimensions:
[12]
Array Stride:
+0x4
Total Size:
0x30

Description

ECC component private key input register type definition 12 32-bit registers storing the private key for signing in big-endian representation. These registers is set before signing operation. The private key should be in [1 : q-1] while q is the group order of the Secp384r1 curve.

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:0] PRIVKEY_IN w 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

PRIVKEY_IN

Private key field

Property Value
resetsignal ^.^.reset_b
